supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: List Based License Exceptions (See Part 740 for a Description of All License Exceptions)
0A506 Semi-Automatic Rifles as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
history.text:
Semi-automatic rifles equal to .50 caliber (12.7 mm) or less, including all non-centerfire (rimfire), n.e.s.
Note 1 to 0A506.a, 0A506.b: “Parts” and “components” that are “specially designed” for a commodity classified under .a or .b of this entry, except those controlled under ECCN 0A509, are controlled under ECCN 0A501.c, 0A501.d, 0A501.x, 0A501.y.
Technical Note 1 to 0A506: Firearms described in 0A506 include those chambered for the .50 BMG cartridge.
Technical Note 2 to 0A506: Firearms described in 0A506 include pistols built with, e.g., AR- or AK-style receivers (frames).
